# UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.Alignment

**Enumeration**

Constants to define the alignment of views in a content-unavailable view.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Alignment
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.Alignment.center**: Views with centered alignment.
- **UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.Alignment.natural**: The default alignment for the current locale.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: The default alignment for the current locale.
items.name: UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.Alignment.natural
